content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Answer (a), (b), and (c).

a) Describe one way in which European overseas trade changed in the period 1500–1800.

b) Describe one continuity in European overseas trade in the period 1500–1800.

c) Explain one effect of overseas trade on European economic theory in the period 1500–1800.

topic.text: 1.6: Technological Advances and the Age of Exploration

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
